Who was Tyre Nichols?
An avid skateboarder known for helping others learn tricks and welcoming newcomers into his circle
Where did the memorial for Tyre Nichols take place?
Regency Community Skatepark
What incident caused Tyre Nichols' death?
He was killed by police officers in Memphis
How many police officers face murder charges for the incident?
Five officers
What happened to the sixth police officer involved in Tyre Nichols' death?
The officer has been suspended
What was the name of the Sacramento suburb where Tyre Nichols and his friends used to skate?
Natomas
What did Tyre Nichols's friends remember him for?
His easygoing nature, welcoming newcomers, and teaching others to skate
What was Tyre Nichols's style of skating?
Laid-back
How did the old skate crew express their applause during the memorial service?
By tapping their boards on the ground
What did Tyre Nichols's uncle say to Danforth and Alex Wilson?
That they were a big part of Tyre's life and that he really loved them
